verses.name: Daniel 11:27
verses.text: And both these kings’ hearts shall be to do mischief, and they shall speak lies at one table; but it shall not prosper: for yet the end shall be at the time appointed.

verses.name: Daniel 11:28
verses.text: Then shall he return into his land with great riches; and his heart shall be against the holy covenant; and he shall do exploits, and return to his own land.

verses.name: Daniel 11:29
verses.text: At the time appointed he shall return, and come toward the south; but it shall not be as the former, or as the latter.
